PropertySetDef.Name: Pset_AudioVisualAppliancePHistory
PropertySetDef.Definition: Captures realtime information for audio-video devices, such as for security camera footage and retail information displays. HISTORY: Added in IFC4.

PropertyDef.Name: PowerState
PropertyDef.Definition: Indicates the power state of the device where True is on and False is off.

PropertyDef.Name: MediaSource
PropertyDef.Definition: Indicates media sources and corresponding names of ports (IfcDistributionPort with FlowDirection=SINK and PredefinedType=AUDIOVISUAL) or aggregated audio/video components (IfcAudioVisualAppliance).

PropertyDef.Name: MediaContent
PropertyDef.Definition: Indicates the media content storage location, such as URLs to camera footage within particular time periods.

PropertyDef.Name: AudioVolume
PropertyDef.Definition: Indicates the audio volume level where the integer level corresponds to an entry or interpolation within Pset_AudioVisualApplianceTypeCommon.AudioVolume.
